title: WTB: T206 HOFs in SGC 60 or better.
author: Vegas-guy

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 HOFs in SGC 60 or better.
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to upgrade some of the HOFs I already have to SGC (only) 60 or better, they must be centered pretty well and have great eye appeal. I will consider lower grades if they look better than the grade given. I'm also looking for HOFs I don't have yet (there are many) Please click on "My HOFs" at bottom of my post to see what I have and what I need (pretty much all of them..:)) Thanks,

Reg

No interest in PSAs?
Thanks,
Cory
